Name: DJ Whip VR
About the game: This is a dynamic, casual, VR arcade game in which you slash enemies with a whip while protecting yourself with a shield from deadly shots. The battle takes place on the dance floor accompanied by energetic electronic dance music. The game mixes samples of different rhythms and melodies in real time depending on how you slash items. You can affect music shifts and sound duration with your whip. Everything in the game moves to the rhythm of your music. Game modes: • Arcade • Speed • Dance • Musical Some videos from latest gamedev conference 1. Guy plays at dance mode 2. Energetic play in Arcade mode 3. Even whild cats can play the game!
